item.title: codejam
item.description: UQCS CodeJam 2020 (presented by Atlassian) 10am – 3:30pm, Saturday 28th March The UQCS CodeJam is an individual competitive programming competition. You get a list of questions to solve varying in difficulty, with harder questions gaining more points. The questions use knowledge from a wide range of fields but all can be solved with the help of code. Itâ€™s a fun challenge to get experience in these styles of questions, which are often asked by employers in technical interviews.
